segments.text: I was wondering if you could go over the services available at EDD to help me get a job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The best opportunity is called callous , which is an Internet-based job placement service that you can make use of .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to have a computer at home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are computers at our EDD offices for you to use in your job search .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any other services available ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have information available about the job market as well as workshops .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kinds of workshops are available at the EDD ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have workshops in Resume Writing and Interviewing , to name a few .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there other places , outside of EDD , that I may look for work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: College job placement services can help .
segments.speaker: S2
